    Library OrganizationHospitality_3_0_0

    • CoreObjects 
      Name Description
      HotelDetails
      An abbreviated short summary of hotel descriptive information.
      SecurityFeatures
      Name of the feature.
      AccessibilityFeatures
      Describes accessibility featrues.
      DetailedHotelSearchCriteria
      The property reference identifies a specific property by using the Chain Code, the Brand Code, and the Hotel Code. The codes used are agreed upon by trading partners.
      BaseHospitalityFacilityQuery
      This object is intended to be extended for use in facility queries.
      Recreation
      Name of the recreation.
